item.title: HUB3: Italiensk Spaghetti Kødboller | Saftige kødboller af oksekød – Fuldkorns spaghetti – Aromatisk tomatsauce – Revet parmesanost – Frisk basilikum | Italiensk Spaghetti grøntsagsboller | Saftige små grøntsagsboller – Fuldkorns spaghetti – Aromatisk tomatsauce – Revet parmesanost – Frisk basilikum | | Week 35 | Monday | Phillipino chicken Adobo | Braised chicken drumstick in vinegar and warm spices | Brown rice with roasted eggplant – Mint salad with fresh vegetables – Spring onion and fresh red chili | Phillipino mushroom Adobo | Fried oysterhats and portobello in sauce with warm spices | Tuesday | Greek pulled pork gyros on flatbread | Tzatziki – Salad with onion, tomato and carrot – French fries – Pomegranate syrup | Wednesday | Indian Tarka Dahl | Yellow aromatic rice – Fresh and creamy raita with tomatoes and herbs – Dukkah | Cake of the day | Apple cake with almonds and whipped cream | Thursday | Danish fish cakes | Herb potatoes, radish and green peas – Fish remoulade – Lemon wedges – Dill | Crispy vegetable cakes | Friday | Italian Spaghetti Meatballs | Juicy beef meatballs – Full grain spaghetti – Aromatic tomato sauce – Shredded parmesan cheese – Fresh basil | Italian Spaghetti Veggie-balls | Juicy small vegetable balls – Full grain spaghetti – Aromatic tomato sauce – Shredded parmesan cheese – Fresh basil | Vegetar | Græsk vegetarisk bønne gyros på fladbrød | Vegetarian | Greek vegetarian bean gyros on flatbread
